translations: vt.敷衍，搪塞；<古>欺骗（fob 的过去式和过去分词）

phrs.translation: 离岸价格；船上交货价格

sentences.sentence: She wouldn't be fobbed off this time.
sentences.translation: 这次她一定不会上当受骗了。

sentences.sentence: He was unaware that he was being fobbed off with out-of-date stock.
sentences.translation: 他没有意识到对方正向他骗售过期存货。

sentences.sentence: This guy fobbed off a fake diamond on me.
sentences.translation: 这个人拿一个假钻石忽悠了我。
